attributes.additional_details:
We are against the revoking of the 2007 FE Teaching Regulations as stated in the Lord Lingfield report Professionalism in Further Education March 2012. We feel that the professionalism of teachers in the Lifelong Learning Sector (which has been so hard to obtain) will be lost.
We would therefore like the Government to reconsider the content of the report and keep the Regulations in place.
As the final report is due in July 2012, action needs to be taken quickly.
